title: Note: Out of the total premium amount collected under this Regulation, 2/3 shall be kept in a separate account to be utilized for infrastructure development by MCGM and 1/3 shall be deposited at the Office of the Deputy Director of Town Planning, Greater Mumbai
clause_text: Note: Out of the total premium amount collected under this Regulation, 2/3 shall be kept in a separate account to be utilized for infrastructure development by MCGM and 1/3 shall be deposited at the Office of the Deputy Director of Town Planning, Greater Mumbai.
